statements: SELECT * FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_count > 0 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT id, discount_code, campaign_name, redemption_count FROM promotional_data WHERE campaign_id = 100 ORDER BY redemption_count DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotional_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT discount_code, redemption_count FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_count < redemption_limit
SELECT campaign_id, coupon_code FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_expiry > '2022-08-31'
SELECT * FROM promotional_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_count > 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, campaign_name, redemption_count FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_limit IS NULL;
SELECT id, discount_code, coupon_code, start_date FROM promotional_data WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, redemption_count, redemption_limit FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_expiry IS NOT NULL AND redemption_expiry > CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM discount_codes;
SELECT discount_code, discount_value FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_value > 0;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY conversions DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_code_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions < 10;
SELECT discount_code, start_date, end_date FROM discount_codes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_discount_codes FROM discount_codes;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes ORDER BY code_id DESC;
SELECT code, discount, start_date FROM discount_codes WHERE discount > 0.05;
SELECT coupon_code, valid_until, description FROM coupons WHERE discount < 0.1 ORDER BY valid_until ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_clicks > 1000 AND conversion_rate < 0.1;
SELECT campaign_id, total_impressions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM discount_codes WHERE discount > 0.5 ORDER BY code ASC;
SELECT code, discount FROM discount_codes WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT code, discount, start_date FROM discount_codes WHERE code LIKE '%AB%' OR code LIKE '%CD%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT coupon_code, description FROM coupons WHERE valid_until > '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM campaign_metrics WHERE conversion_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM discount_codes;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT coupon_id, coupon_code, discount_percent FROM coupons ORDER BY discount_percent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT coupon_code, discount_percent FROM coupons WHERE valid_from < '2022-03-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue FROM campaign_metrics WHERE end_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discount_codes JOIN coupons ON discount_codes.code_id = coupons.coupon_id;
SELECT * FROM discounts;
SELECT id, code FROM coupons WHERE code = 'SUMMER2022';
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, discount_id FROM campaign_discounts WHERE discount_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY code DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coupons.code, discounts.code, discounts.amount FROM coupons JOIN discounts ON coupons.discount_id = discounts.id WHERE discounts.amount < 100 ORDER BY coupons.code ASC;

SELECT campaigns.name, campaign_metrics.impressions, campaign_metrics.clicks FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON campaigns.id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE campaign_metrics.impressions > 1000 AND campaign_metrics.clicks < 500 ORDER BY campaigns.start_date, campaign_metrics.impressions DESC;

SELECT discounts.code, COUNT(campaign_discounts.campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM discounts LEFT JOIN campaign_discounts ON discounts.id = campaign_discounts.discount_id GROUP BY discounts.code HAVING total_campaigns > 5 ORDER BY total_campaigns DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT discounts.code, coupons.code, campaigns.name FROM discounts, coupons, campaigns WHERE discounts.id = 1 AND coupons.discount_id = discounts.id AND campaigns.start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaigns.end_date ASC;
